roleset.name: make pure, remove impurities
roleset.note: PURIFY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'purify' based on sentences in brown; adjectival 'pure' based on BOLT-6. Member of VNcls other_cos-45.4, cheat-10.6. (from purify.01-v)

example.name: purify-v: passive
example.text: After how many generations is such wealth (mounting all the while through the manipulations of high finance) purified of taint [*T*-1]?
example.arg: such wealth (mounting all the while through the manipulations of high finance)

example.name: purify-v: unstated impurities
example.text: And when this was gone, he hadn't even a little bitter tablet [0] [*T*-3]to purify other water if he were to discover some stagnant jungle pool.
example.arg: if he were to discover some stagnant jungle pool

roleset.name: free of impurities
roleset.note: PURE-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia for unification as an alias file. (from pure.01-j)

example.name: pure-j
example.text: Anything linked to money and material benefits can not be that pure
example.arg: Anything linked to money and material benefits
